section.p: Examination of the mediastinum through an incision above the sternum [Source: Merriam-Webster's Medical Dictionary, 2002 Merriam-Webster, Inc. ]

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] mediastinoscopy with data type Code
Indicates the results of the diagnostic test MEDIASTINOSCOPY. Possoble values are Not done; Positive; Negative; Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfMediastinoscopy with data type Point In Time
The date of the diagnostic test MEDIASTINOSCOPY.

Contains exactly one [1..1] mediastinoscopy with data type Code
Indicates the results of the diagnostic test MEDIASTINOSCOPY. Possoble values are Not done; Positive; Negative; Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfMediastinoscopy with data type Point In Time
The date of the diagnostic test MEDIASTINOSCOPY.
